info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 5:57PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 556 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from North Blenheim to near New Ashford and moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Hancock and New Ashford around 600 PM EST. Cheshire around 610 PM EST. Pittsfield around 625 PM EST. Lenox around 635 PM EST. Lee around 645 PM EST. Becket around 655 PM EST. Otis around 700 PM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 22. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
